name: vid2av1-gui
description: Windows Tauri GUI for AV1 video conversion with FFmpeg (optimized for NVIDIA RTX workflows).

scripts.ts:build: npm run ui:build && npm run scripts:build
scripts.dev: npm run ts:build && npm run ffmpeg:ensure && tauri dev
scripts.build: npm run ts:build && npm run ffmpeg:ensure && tauri build --no-bundle && node scripts/dist/stage-portable.mjs
